instructions: In Google Maps or Search, select the restaurant you want to eat at. In the restaurant's knowledge panel, click Join waitlist . To adjust your party size, click Add or Remove . Then, click Continue . Enter your phone number. Then, click Join waitlist . Note: The number you enter is used as the main point of contact with the restaurant. To return to the business knowledge panel, click Done . You ll see your current wait time and how many parties are ahead of you. Note: To remove yourself from the waitlist, click Leave the waitlist .
